description:
Welcome to BooKoo's.

You must have a WIFI connection to get all of the features of this app. 


Update 5.9.4 Updated a few and add a few :)
Update 5.9.2
You now have over 60 apps to choose from.
Added games, apps and more.
did a lot over the weekend.
Added easy mode to Simple Lines game per request plus worked on more apps that was already with-in BooKoo's
Added Jewels, 8Ball in Space, Checkers and GO to games page.
Added Mayan calendar, Fish Tank and Mystify to last page.
Soon I will need to up the price as you get so much for such a small price ;) hummm...

BooKoo's is an application launcher that has 60 apps with-in. All of them in a neat desktop application. All said, it would cost you over $40 to buy them all one by one. awesome deal for all you get in this app. Plus you get Weather and Radar at your finger tips.
I set up two weather Widgets that will popup on just a tap and you are still within the desktop to launch any application of the 60 you wish. 
This app is my pet project so I will add cool widgets as time goes on. 

Update 5.9.0
Added - Currency Converter 
Added - Unit Conversion 
Added - ScoreBoard

Update 5.8.6
Added - In Theaters Now

Update 5.8.5
Added - Christmas Planner

Apps and Games included are

: Prototype5
: Stock Portfolio
: Postal Code Lookup
: Logic Master (MasterMind clone).
: Texas Hold'em.
: Blackjack.
: Simple Neon Slots.
: Find Me a... (Finds places near you).
: NapTime
: Streaming FM Player. Ultimate Edition
: Balloon Go boom2
: 6 in 1 Solitaire
: Chaos Theory
: Two Player Chess
: Colora
: Dots Lines Squares
: DropMe
: FeedZ
: Music Discovery.
: Simple Lines
: Flix Tracker.
: Captain's Mistress.
: Fun With Street View
: Get5
: Kings
: Simple Mahjong
: Sticky Notes.
: Sketchy.
: Simple Poker
: Puzzler.
: Scientific Calculator HD
: Tweeple Near me
: Simple Sudoku.
: My Timer
: Simple Translator.
: Simple Weather Radar
: Yview
: My Planner
: TimeSheet calculator.

Plus many more not listed.
